#Build libqq-pidgin by emerge

= Introduction =
  This is a guide to build libqq-pidgin for pidgin in gentoo

= Details =

First , add libqq-pidgin's overlay

[http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/]

{{{
svn co http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/ /var/lib/libqq-pidgin
vim /etc/make.conf
}}}

append
{{{
PORTDIR_OVERLAY="
$PORTDIR_OVERLAY
/var/lib/libqq-pidgin
"
}}}

Then` USE="-qq" emerge pidgin-qq2010 -av `
